name: Sora Takenouchi & Mimi Tachikawa
effect: [Start of Your Turn] If your opponent doesn't have a level 4 or lower Digimon in play, gain 2 memory.[Your Turn] When one of your purple Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Tamer to trigger ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.) Then, trash 1 card in your hand.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
